titles.title: Unemployment Compensation Extension bill
To increase the number of weeks for which emergency unemployment compensation is payable.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E295-296)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 (Public Law 102-164) to increase the number of weeks for which emergency unemployment compensation is payable.
